elements.title: ZX Spectrum (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the ZX Spectrum (pictured) is one of the best-selling British computers of all time?

elements.title: Kenneth Odumegwu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kenneth Odumegwu had never appeared in an organized American football game prior to playing in the NFL?

elements.title: The Devil's Chord (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Doctor Who episode "The Devil's Chord" references the events of an episode that aired more than sixty years before?

elements.title: Rachel Brem (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Rachel Brem discovered a tumor in her own breast while testing ultrasound equipment for her hospital?

elements.title: Ang Ating Musika (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that for her residency Ang Ating Musika, Regine Velasquez performed "two concerts-in-one"?

elements.title: Bianca Babb (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bianca Babb, a pioneer girl captured by Comanches, described her time among them as "every day seemed to be a holiday", despite the hardships of her initial capture?

elements.title: Dellwood Cemetery (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the two marble statues flanking the Dellwood Cemetery gates represent Mourning and Resurrection?

elements.title: Ola Labib (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that before becoming a comedian, Ola Labib was a pharmacist who had never been inside a pub before her first gig?

elements.title: Windswept Adan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the idea for Windswept Adan came to Ichiko Aoba after she noticed the translucency of a sea grape?
